journalVolumeIssue.name: Journal
journalVolumeIssue.description: Indicates the volume, issue and date of a journal, which this Dataset is associated with.

journalVolume.name: Volume
journalVolume.description: The journal volume which this Dataset is associated with (e.g., Volume 4).

journalIssue.name: Issue
journalIssue.description: The journal issue number which this Dataset is associated with (e.g., Number 2, Autumn).

journalPubDate.name: Publication Date
journalPubDate.description: The publication date for this journal volume/issue, which this Dataset is associated with (e.g., 1999).

journalArticleType.name: Type of Article
journalArticleType.description: Indicates what kind of article this is, for example, a research article, a commentary, a book or product review, a case report, a calendar, etc (based on JATS).
